snippet: Republicans described a failure to protect Americans and Democrats accused them of exploiting an incident almost certain to surface in Tuesday’s presidential debate.
abstract: Debate over the violence in Benghazi, Libya, that claimed four American lives becomes angry focus of Sunday morning talk shows; Republicans label attack a dangerous failure by the Obama administration to protect Americans across the region and Democrats accuse them of exploiting the incident; dispute that seems almost certain to surface in next presidential debate.
lead_paragraph: Republicans described a failure to protect Americans and Democrats accused them of exploiting an incident almost certain to surface in Tuesday’s presidential debate.

headline.seo: Benghazi Episode Takes on Political Overtones
headline.main: Two Sides Trade Criticism in Rancor Over Libya Attack
headline.print_headline: On Talk Shows, Attack in Libya Becomes Subject of Political Back and Forth

keywords.value: Middle East and North Africa Unrest (2010- )
